text:
Is it possible to create a `groupedhist` with a categorical x-axis ? I tried
```@df count groupedhist(
		:created_on_month, 
		group = :initial_conversation_channel, 
		bar_position = :dodge
	)```
but I got the following error *`MethodError: no method matching isfinite(::String)`*
